title: Wts: T206 bobby wallace (portrait) ex+ condition!

posts.post_title: Wts: T206 bobby wallace (portrait) ex+ condition!
posts.post_content: Sweet cap 150 back that is extremely clean. Very solid card. Detailed scans available, just drop me your email. Priced at $350, thanks.
Scans please. [url]trae@t206.org[/url] Will love the day you figure out picture posting in forum posts! :)
